## MatrixBuilder.hilbert() method

Constructs a Hilbert matrix of the specified size

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hilbert(size: number): M;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | <code>number</code> | The size of the Hilbert matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`M`

## Example


```
const H = matrixBuilder.hilbert(3);

// [  1   1/2  1/3 ]
// [ 1/2  1/3  1/4 ]
// [ 1/3  1/4  1/5 ]

```
